Is the latest version not working well? You can prevent an app from updating! Go to the Apps tab in the bottom menu and long press the app of your choice.
Zahtjeva dozvolu za korištenje vanjske memorije
Molimo vas da dopustite aplikaciji pristup mobilnoj memoriji da bismo mogli preuzeti i instalirati ovu aplikaciju.
Molimo dopustite pristup kameri uređaja kako biste mogli snimati pomoću ove aplikacije.

Every app has a unique signature generated by its developer and, in this case, it proves that the developer is the right one.
Every app has a unique signature generated by its developer and in this case we weren\'t able to match this signature with any known developer.
Every app has a unique signature generated by its developer and in this case it seems the author isn\'t the official one.
All the apps you find in our platform are scanned by several antivirus and it seems this one is completely safe to use!
All the apps you find in our platform are scanned by several antivirus and it seems this one is infected, so DON\'T DOWNLOAD IT!
All the apps you find in our platform are scanned by several antivirus but this one is still to be analysed, so we recommend you to wait for the results before downloading.

The cryptocurrency for the app economy is here! Get free AppCoins by using your favorite apps.
Everything you need to know about AppCoins
You need to install the AppCoins Wallet to get rewards and process all transactions. Once you install it, it’ll do everything for you!
Open it to get it automatically configured. You\'ll receive your rewards here and it\'ll process all your transactions!
You\'ll get a reward for installing and spending 2 minutes in the apps with the symbol %s You can find them in the bundle \"Earn AppCoins Credits\" in Aptoide home!
You need to verify your wallet to receive rewards. It\'ll only take you a few seconds!
Log in to keep up with the liking!
Install the following apps and get up to %s AppCoins Credits to spend in your favorite games!
First, get the AppCoins Wallet to receive your AppCoins Credits.
Then install any of these games to earn your rewards!
Earn %s AppCoins Credits by installing apps and spend them in your favorite games!
Don\'t forget to claim your %s AppCoins Credits.
You need to update Aptoide to see this promotion.
This promotion just slipped away, but we\'ll do another one soon!
In the meanwhile, you can earn AppCoins Credits by installing and spending 2 minutes in any of these apps.
Install the following apps and get up to %s in AppCoins Credits to spend in your favorite games!
First, get the AppCoins Wallet to receive your rewards.
Then install any of these games to earn your rewards!
Earn %s in AppCoins Credits by installing apps and spend them in your favorite games!
Play the video and get AppCoins Credits for free to spend in your favorite games.
Tell us your wallet address! Tap below and the AppCoins Wallet will take care of it.
Your AppCoins Credits will be available in your wallet soon! Enjoy your gaming!
The AppCoins Wallet is your tool not only for receiving your APPC but also to process payments.
Intense real-time combat in a huge fantasy world! Join friends to clash rivals in the Arena.
Fight for the glory in a world of Elysians! It offers quality multiplayer brawls and 1v1 combats.
Take control of a Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage to survive as long as possible.
A new sandbox survival mobile game that features the utmost fun of building and firing.
Driven by their ambition and greed, Lords seek power and shatter the peace that once reigned.
A 2D mobile shooter centered around an army of mercenaries trying to save the world.
An explosion-laden, arcade racing game that will have you feeling like a badass in seconds.
A great fun words game available offline. Find all the words for every level!
Start the happy and mystery journey with various candies in sweet wonderland!
Reveal the hidden answer by eliminating letter tiles. A great brain challenge!
Welcome to the Jungle! Release your beast and jump into battle royale multiplayer battles!
Fight against powerful enemies and discover new virtual worlds in this unique action RPG game.
One of the best combinations of arcade Shoot \'Em Up and Monster Collecting Games.
Escape all the obstacles in the jungle, with this incredibly fun game.
A free beauty camera and a global community of photography with over 800 million users.
An addictive game that successfully combines strategy and time management features!
Beat the banker by taking deals or simply not and holding out to reveal your briefcase.
Build your army, construct a city and destroy your enemies on the battlefield.
Help Hercules and Megara undo the damage done by the vengeful Gods in this greek adventure.
If you are a fan of sky fire shooting, Space shooter: Galaxy attack game is game for you.
A 3D free-to-play sandbox game about adventure, exploration, and creating your dream worlds.
The coolest new endless runner game! Outrun Combo Panda and unlock Ryan\'s costumes.
Trade lands, build houses, win auctions, roll the wheel of fortune, and have fun!
A wrestling career that challenges you in both the ring and the backstage.
A puzzle game to draw a safe path for the zip line and avoid the dangers!
The pressure is on, so pick up students, drop them to school and handle the traffic.

Everything You Need to Know About AppCoins
AppCoins and AppCoins Credits are the currencies for in-app transactions. The best part? You\'ll earn up to %s%% bonus in all purchases!
